tool_description: Collects and validates basic customer information from chat input for identity verification purposes.
error_messages: Invalid name format: Names must contain only letters and spaces, 2-50 characters each.
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address with @ symbol and domain.
Invalid phone format: Phone number must be 10-15 digits, optionally with country code.
Missing required information: First name and last name are required fields.
usage: Provide customer's first_name and last_name as minimum required fields. Optionally include email, phone, or account_number to improve verification accuracy.

customer_id.description: Generated unique identifier for this customer session

collected_fields.description: List of successfully collected and validated fields

validation_status.description: Overall validation status: valid, partial, or invalid
